author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ADDITIONAL HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OSCAR POSSIBLE OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN CUBA AND THE SOUTHEASTERN BAHAMAS THROUGH TUESDAY...
summary:
...ADDITIONAL HEAVY RAINFALL FROM OSCAR POSSIBLE OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN CUBA AND THE SOUTHEASTERN BAHAMAS THROUGH TUESDAY...
 As of 11:00 PM EDT Mon Oct 21
 the center of Oscar was located near 21.8, -75.4
 with movement NNE at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Oscar (AT1/AL162024)
